alert.note: Alert for Baker; Bradford; Eastern Alachua; Southern Columbia; Union (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 7:30PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Bradford, north central Alachua, southwestern Baker, Union and southeastern Columbia Counties through 800 PM EDT... At 730 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lake Butler, moving south at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Lake Butler, Raiford, Worthington Spring, Worthington Springs, Palestine Community, Groves, Providence, Beasley, New River and Upland Pines. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Baker; Bradford; Eastern Alachua; Southern Columbia; Union
